hadiths.text: It was narrated from Jabir bin ‘Abdullah that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“All of ‘Arafat is the place of standing, but keep away from the interior of ‘Uranah. And all of Muzdalifah is the place of standing but keep away from the interior of Muhassir. And all of Mina is the place of sacrifice, except for what is beyond ‘Aqaba.”
